title: I always hated the idea of early game bullies...
body: They dominate the lane phase most games, forcing you to play safe. They can be easily underestimated and get a kill. Some even go mostly tanky items, and still out trade everyone. They also transition well into the mid-late game in most cases as very strong front lines. Just always hated the idea that these champs are supposed to fall off later in the game... Especially now that early game is 10 times more crucial as games are getting shorter and shorter. It just feels bad playing against these things. I am not saying they shouldn't be in the game, I am just saying it sucks to have to play scared all lane phase, and then watch these bullies bully your team in the mid-late game.

replies.body:

But it feels so rewarding when you outscale them and just murder the crap out of them when you play it smart. It can even teach you some important things.


My last 3 games where I pick Nasus against Heimerdinger, the bane to all top laners, I just stepped all over the little hairball. Was never not satisfying.
